---
title: "CharMap Test D3"
output: html_document
---


```{r}
library(r2d3)
library(tidyverse)
dat_raw <- readRDS("CharacterPaths.RDS")

dat_test <- dat_raw %>% 
  filter(Character == "GRANT", Loc_map == "Isla Nublar")

write.csv(dat_test, "CharacterPaths.csv", row.names = FALSE)


r2d3(data=dat_test, script = "charmap_v1.js")
```
